testCase.name: TransactionSettings Render
TransactionSettings should render 'accountForLiquidation' select input with correct options
TransactionSettings should render 'accountForLiquidation' select input without any options
handleAccountForLiquidation should generate accountData and call setCustomerData when profileIsSuccess is true
handleAccountForLiquidation should update formData and call setValue when accountData exists and formData.transactionSettingModel.accountForLiquidation does not exist
handleAccountForLiquidation should not update formData or call setValue when accountData does not exist or formData.transactionSettingModel.accountForLiquidation exists
handleAccountForLiquidation should not update formData or call setValue when profileIsSuccess is false

updateInvestmentTabs should update amount property with the total value of investments for each tab
updateInvestmentTabs should update totalValue property with the total count of investments for each tab
updateInvestmentTabs should return an empty array when the input tabs array is empty
updateInvestmentTabs should return an array of objects with amount property set to 0.00 and totalValue property set to 0 total investments when the input tabs array is empty
updateInvestmentTabs should return an array of objects with the same length as the input tabs array

Overview should display investment amounts and total values correctly formatted

handleMessage should set success text to "Product Setup saved to draft" and open success modal when modifySuccess is true
